revised_title: Elliptic Functions and the Rotation of a Rigid Body
tldr: The author applies the theory of elliptic functions to the rotation of a rigid body around a fixed point, providing a new method of investigation for determining the dynamic state of a body at any given time. The study involves the use of an ellipsoid of moments and the properties of cones and curves of double flexure, leading to the discovery of a new representative curve of elliptic functions of the first order.
